item.title: CDC vaccine advisory panel recommends against flu vaccines containing thimerosal
item.description: The CDC's vaccine advisory committee voted to recommend annual flu vaccines but against flu shots containing the preservative thimerosal

item.title: Senate GOP 'frustrated' by parliamentarian's Medicaid ruling in Trump's bill
item.description: The decision is a major setback for Republicans who are under time pressure.

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Hegseth defends Iran bombing, criticizes media
item.description: Hegseth said the bombing of Iran is the most "complex and secretive military operation in history."

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Pentagon provides more details of US strikes against Iran
item.description: Trump, speaking at a news conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands, celebrated allies boosting defense spending.

item.title: Pentagon to set up 2 more military buffer zones near border in Arizona and Texas
item.description: The move brings to four the number of "National Defense Areas" near the border where U.S. military personnel can temporarily detain undocumented migra...
